participant_1.background:
I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.
I find that getting lost in a good book takes me back to my childhood.
I value my friends the most.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I like to visit running and football websites to keep up with the latest news.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together.
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
i play jazz piano in a band.
I run track for myself.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

content.text: Hi there! I just finished reading a book about a woman who escaped from a cult.
It was called "The Escape". It was really good. I'm glad she was able to escape.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! I love reading books about people who have overcome difficult circumstances.
I also like to read books about people who have different lifestyles than me. It's interesting to learn about different perspectives.
That's true! I like to learn about different cultures and ways of life.
Me too! I think it's important to be open-minded and accepting of others.
I agree! I think it's important to be understanding and compassionate.
I'm glad we agree! I think it's important to be kind to others.
Me too! I think it's important to make the world a better place.
I agree! I think we should all do our part to make the world a better place.
